rukus.text: 26|176|krom robsa ai ka sa ban bdeseth nung banda anakneasar .
26|177|nowpel del shou eb ban pol towkean puokke tha tae  puok anak min kaotakhlach a l laoh te ryy
26|178|pitabrakd nasa  khnhom kuchea anakneasar mneak da smaohtrang  samreab puok anak .
26|179|dau che  neah  chaur puok anak kaotakhlach a l laoh  ning brate b tde tam  khnhom choh .
26|180|khnhom min snaesom kamrei namuoy pi puok anak champoh kar ampeav  neav noh laey .  te phalbony nei kar ampeavneav robsakhnhom ku now leu mcheasa  del krobkrong piphp teangoasa .
26|181|chaur puok anak bampenh rongveal aoy ban troemotrauv  haey chaur puok  anak kom thveu khluon chea anak del keibambat aoy saoh .
26|182|chaur puok anak thloeng nung chonhching del troemotrauv .
26|183|haey chaur puok anak kom keng br v pea  ch mnoussa lok nouv kammosetthi  robsa puokke .  haey chaur puok anak kom bangk vineasakamm now leu phendei nih  aoy saoh .
26|184|haey chaur puok anak kaotakhlach champoh anak del ban bangkeut  puok anak  ning puok chomnean moun .
26|185|puokke ban chhlaey tha tampit  anak kreante chea anak del  sthet knongchamnaom puok del trauv m nd akm bonnaoh .
26|186|haey anak ka minmen chea avei krawpi chea mnoussa thommotea dauchchea  puok yeung noh laey  haey yeung chuecheak tha  anak pitchea sthetnow  knongchamnaom anak del phout kohk .
26|187|dau che  neah  chaur anak tomleak muoy bamnek( tearounakamm) pileu  mekh mk leu puok yeung choh  brasenbae anak sthetnow knongchamnaom anak  del troemotrauv men noh .
26|188|keat( sahou eb) ban niyeay tha  mcheasa robsakhnhom doeng bamphot  champoh avei del puok anak kampoung thveu .

26|189|haey puokke ban bdeseth nung keat  dau che  neah tearounakamm nei thngai  del phleung chenhpi mlob popk ban thleak mk leu puokke .  pitabrakd nasa  vea kuchea tearounakamm nei thngai da thomtheng .
26|190|pitabrakd nasa  nowknong pru tde kar noh kuchea phosdo tang  muoy da chbasaleasa .  te puokke pheakochraen ku kmean chomnue laey .
26|191|haey pitabrakd nasa  mcheasa robsa anak kuchea mcheasa mha khlangokla  mha anet sraleanh .
